extendedInfo.description: What do you know about "famous women" of the world? Check how well you're informed by playing this free "trivia quiz"! See if you know some facts about popular sport women, famous actresses or greatest female singers! Questions about some of your favorite female celebrities of today are included in the quiz - start playing and find out more about them!-	 4 Different Game Modes-10 Questions, 25 Questions, 50 Questions and 5 Errors â Out!-	Choose the correct answer from A, B, C or D!-	Answer the questions quickly and avoid giving incorrect answers to get higher rankings!-	Answer the question worth more than 2000 points and get Scandalous Score Booster!-	Endless Modeâ5 Errors â Out! â Your game lasts until you choose 5 incorrect answers!-	Log in with Facebook to share your score and achievements!The quiz contains various types of interesting questions about influential female figures both from the past and today's world. Your knowledge about their professional and personal lives or their achievements is put to the test here.Women have made undeniable contributions throughout history. They have been pioneers in business, science, arts and more. During the past, there were many of them who have achieved success despite male oppression and they continue to make gains in the modern era.Some of them have shown greatest success in athletics and sport as well. For example, the sister of Venus Williams, Serena has enjoyed a close tennis rivalry with her sister, and has won eight Grand Slam titles and an Olympic gold medal in the doubles. Others turned out very influential or popular in the film industry. Marilyn Monroe rose from childhood poverty to become one of the most iconic film legends. Her films were moderately successful, but her lasting fame came through her photogenic good looks and aura of glamour and sophistication.You probably know something about popular female stars of today - use this opportunity to check if your information is true and find out some more about them. Enjoy this entertaining quiz with questions and answers.

reviews.title: pretty good
